name: Space Runner (Space's Entertainment)
description:
Two languages: Russian and English.

Were you thinking about different actions or bihavior of the character, while you were reading a book& 

Here is your chance in visual novel "Space Runner"!

Enjoy the world of a small but exiting story as a quantum specialist Laurah Jones.

You gonna have a difficuld mission. What would you do?

Choose your own characteristic for your character.

Choose different dialogs to get one of four endings.
